org.apache.ignite.configuration

Class QueryConfiguration

extends Object
    Configuration for embedded indexing facilities.

    • Method Detail

      • setMaxOffHeapMemory

        public void setMaxOffHeapMemory(long maxOffHeapMemory)
        Sets maximum amount of memory available to off-heap storage. Possible values are
        • -1 - Means that off-heap storage is disabled.
        • 0 - Ignite will not limit off-heap storage (it's up to user to properly add and remove entries from cache to ensure that off-heap storage does not grow indefinitely.
        • Any positive value specifies the limit of off-heap storage in bytes.
        Default value is -1, which means that off-heap storage is disabled by default.

        Use off-heap storage to load gigabytes of data in memory without slowing down Garbage Collection. Essentially in this case you should allocate very small amount of memory to JVM and Ignite will cache most of the data in off-heap space without affecting JVM performance at all.

        Parameters:
        maxOffHeapMemory - Maximum memory in bytes available to off-heap memory space.

      • getMaxOffHeapMemory

        public long getMaxOffHeapMemory()
        Gets maximum amount of memory available to off-heap storage.
        Returns:
        Maximum memory in bytes available to off-heap memory space.

      • setMaxOffheapRowsCacheSize

        public void setMaxOffheapRowsCacheSize(int size)
        Specifies max allowed size of cache for deserialized offheap rows to avoid deserialization costs for most frequently used ones. In general performance is better with greater cache size. Must be more than 128 items.
        Parameters:
        size - Cache size in items.

      • setSearchPath

        public void setSearchPath(String... searchPath)
        Sets the optional search path consisting of space names to search SQL schema objects. Useful for cross cache queries to avoid writing fully qualified table names.
        Parameters:
        searchPath - Search path.

      • getSearchPath

        @Nullable
public String[] getSearchPath()
        Gets the optional search path consisting of space names to search SQL schema objects.
        Returns:
        Search path.

      • getInitialScriptPath

public String getInitialScriptPath()
        Gets script path to be ran against H2 database after opening.
        Returns:
        Script path.

      • setInitialScriptPath

        public void setInitialScriptPath(String initScriptPath)
        Sets script path to be ran against H2 database after opening. The script must be UTF-8 encoded file.
        Parameters:
        initScriptPath - Script path.

      • setIndexCustomFunctionClasses

        public void setIndexCustomFunctionClasses(Class<?>... idxCustomFuncClss)
        Sets classes with methods annotated by QuerySqlFunction to be used as user-defined functions from SQL queries.
        Parameters:
        idxCustomFuncClss - List of classes.

      • getIndexCustomFunctionClasses

        @Nullable
public Class<?>[] getIndexCustomFunctionClasses()
        Gets classes with methods annotated by QuerySqlFunction to be used as user-defined functions from SQL queries.
        Returns:
        List of classes.

      • getLongQueryExecutionTimeout

        public long getLongQueryExecutionTimeout()
        Get long query execution time timeout.
        Returns:
        Long query execution timeout.

      • setLongQueryExecutionTimeout

        public void setLongQueryExecutionTimeout(long longQryExecTimeout)
        Set query execution time threshold. If queries exceed this threshold, then a warning will be printed out. If setLongQueryExplain(boolean) is set to true, then execution plan will be printed out as well.

        If not provided, default value is defined by DFLT_LONG_QRY_EXEC_TIMEOUT.

        Parameters:
        longQryExecTimeout - Long query execution timeout.
        See Also:
        setLongQueryExplain(boolean)

      • isLongQueryExplain

        public boolean isLongQueryExplain()
        Gets flag marking SPI should print SQL execution plan for long queries (explain SQL query).
        Returns:
        Flag marking SPI should print SQL execution plan for long queries (explain SQL query).

      • setLongQueryExplain

        public void setLongQueryExplain(boolean longQryExplain)
        If true, SPI will print SQL execution plan for long queries (explain SQL query). The time threshold of long queries is controlled via setLongQueryExecutionTimeout(long) parameter.

        If not provided, default value is false.

        Parameters:
        longQryExplain - Flag marking SPI should print SQL execution plan for long queries (explain SQL query).
        See Also:
        setLongQueryExecutionTimeout(long)

      • setUseOptimizedSerializer

        public void setUseOptimizedSerializer(boolean useOptimizedSerializer)
        The flag indicating that serializer for H2 database will be set to Ignite's marshaller. This setting usually makes sense for offheap indexing only.

        Default is DFLT_USE_OPTIMIZED_SERIALIZER.

        Parameters:
        useOptimizedSerializer - Flag value.

      • isUseOptimizedSerializer

        public boolean isUseOptimizedSerializer()
        The flag indicating that serializer for H2 database will be set to Ignite's marshaller. This setting usually makes sense for offheap indexing only.

        Default is DFLT_USE_OPTIMIZED_SERIALIZER.

        Returns:
        Flag value.
